name: Skullball 2
description:
Skullball 2

A simple volleyball game for those friendly hotseat matches with buddies. 

You can also compete against AI.

Now  featuring singleplayer campaign mode. Defeat 5 bosses to unlock 5 stages. Be carefull thou bosses have special powers.

Compared to Skullball 1 everything is better:
  • more stages to play in
  • you can change the look of players
  • options that allow sound settings, control scheme and screen size
  • campaign mode
  • better AI, but not too good not counting the trajectory of the ball
  • more sounds and more effects
  • better match rule settings

Version 1.1

  • WASD keys work in menu
  • New Ball
